segments.text: I want to buy a gift for my father . Will you go with me to choose one for him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Is it your father's birthday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you know ? Tomorrow is Father's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! How could I forget such an important holiday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You also need to choose a gift for your father , right ?
segments.speaker: S1
